selectDataType: Select the data type that will be stored in the field
addGlobalIDNotice: The field will be automatically populated for existing data in the layer or table. Once added, this field cannot be edited or deleted.
newFieldTypeNotice: This field type may not be fully supported in some clients.
syncEnabled: Some field types cannot be added because sync is enabled on the layer.
nullFieldTypeError: You must select a field type to continue.
fieldNameCharacterNotice: Field names longer than 31 characters are not compatible with offline use.
provideDescription: Provide a description of the information the field will contain
nullableTooltipInfo: This setting is not editable if your layer already contains data.

tooltipInfo.globalIDExists: A GlobalID field already exists on this service. Only one GlobalID field can be present on a layer or table.
tooltipInfo.enterpriseTimestampOffset: ArcGIS Enterprise does not support Timestamp Offset fields in hosted feature layers.

text.title: Text
text.description: Values that contain alphanumeric or special characters.

esriFieldTypeString.title: String
esriFieldTypeString.description: Store a set of alphanumeric characters of a specified length.

esriFieldTypeBigInteger.title: Big Integer
esriFieldTypeBigInteger.description: Store whole numbers from -(2${startSup}53${endSup}-1) to 2${startSup}53${endSup}-1. Use this field type when using numbers that are outside of the supported integer field range.

esriFieldTypeDate.title: Date
esriFieldTypeDate.description: Store values with date and time.

esriFieldTypeDateOnly.title: Date Only
esriFieldTypeDateOnly.description: Store date values with no time values.

esriFieldTypeTimeOnly.title: Time Only
esriFieldTypeTimeOnly.description: Store time values with no date values.

esriFieldTypeTimestampOffset.title: Timestamp Offset
esriFieldTypeTimestampOffset.description: Store values indicating the date, time, and offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

globalIdentifiers.title: Global identifiers
globalIdentifiers.description: Values that uniquely identify a feature or table row.

esriFieldTypeGlobalID.title: GlobalID
esriFieldTypeGlobalID.description: Store a 36 character string consisting of letters and numbers used to uniquely identify a feature.

esriFieldTypeGUID.title: GUID
esriFieldTypeGUID.description: Store a 36 character string consisting of letters and numbers. A Globally Unique Identifier, or GUID, is frequently used to manage relationships between features.

addFieldErrors.outOfRangeValueError: This value is out of range.
addFieldErrors.invalidInputsError: Check that your field parameters are filled correctly.
addFieldErrors.existingFieldNameError: The field name cannot be the same as an existing field name.
addFieldErrors.invalidNameInputSQLError: The field name cannot be the same as an SQL keyword.
addFieldErrors.invalidNameInputInvalidCharactersError: Must begin with a letter and can only contain letters, numbers, and '_'.
addFieldErrors.lengthExceeds: The field name length should be less than or equal to ${maxFieldNameLength} characters.
addFieldErrors.defaultValueExceeds: The default value exceeds the specified field length.
addFieldErrors.readOnlyErrorMessage: ArcGIS Online is experiencing operational issues and has switched to read-only mode. Some capabilities may be limited. For the latest updates on when this will be resolved, visit the ArcGIS Online Health Dashboard.
addFieldErrors.readOnlyErrorMessageEnterprise: ArcGIS Enterprise is experiencing operational issues and has switched to read-only mode. Some capabilities may be limited.

genericAddFieldError.title: Error
genericAddFieldError.description: An error occurred while adding your field.
